mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_extendinfo (userId, logo, realName, sex, birthday, tall, weight, nation, politics, marry, contactPhone, contactEmail, idCard, residence, location, nowStatus, wishType, wishBusiness, wishJob, wishLocation, wishSalary, collegeName, specialities, graduationTime, collegeType, diplomas, degree, classDuty, studentDuty, scholarship, scholarshipRange, awards, awardsRange, awardsDes, internProject, internTime, internDuty, internDesc, hobby, honor, assessment, createTimeStamp, lastUpdateTimeStamp, isDel) values (#{userId}, #{logo}, #{realName}, #{sex}, #{birthday}, #{tall}, #{weight}, #{nation}, #{politics}, #{marry}, #{contactPhone}, #{contactEmail}, #{idCard}, #{residence}, #{location}, #{nowStatus}, #{wishType}, #{wishBusiness}, #{wishJob}, #{wishLocation}, #{wishSalary}, #{collegeName}, #{specialities}, #{graduationTime}, #{collegeType}, #{diplomas}, #{degree}, #{classDuty}, #{studentDuty}, #{scholarship}, #{scholarshipRange}, #{awards}, #{awardsRange}, #{awardsDes}, #{internProject}, #{internTime}, #{internDuty}, #{internDesc}, #{hobby}, #{honor}, #{assessment}, unix_timestamp(now())*1000, unix_timestamp(now())*1000, 0)
mapper.update:
UPDATE user_extendinfo
logo=#{logo},
score=#{score},
realName=#{realName},
sex=#{sex},
birthday=#{birthday},
tall=#{tall},
weight=#{weight},
nation=#{nation},
politics=#{politics},
marry=#{marry},
contactPhone=#{contactPhone},
contactEmail=#{contactEmail},
idCard=#{idCard},
residence=#{residence},
location=#{location},
nowStatus=#{nowStatus},
wishType=#{wishType},
wishBusiness=#{wishBusiness},
wishJob=#{wishJob},
wishLocation=#{wishLocation},
wishSalary=#{wishSalary},
collegeName=#{collegeName},
specialities=#{specialities},
graduationTime=#{graduationTime},
collegeType=#{collegeType},
diplomas=#{diplomas},
degree=#{degree},
classDuty=#{classDuty},
studentDuty=#{studentDuty},
scholarship=#{scholarship},
scholarshipRange=#{scholarshipRange},
awards=#{awards},
awardsRange=#{awardsRange},
awardsDes=#{awardsDes},
internProject=#{internProject},
internTime=#{internTime},
internDuty=#{internDuty},
internDesc=#{internDesc},
hobby=#{hobby},
honor=#{honor},
assessment=#{assessment},
lastUpdateTimeStamp=unix_timestamp(now())*1000
userId = #{userId}
